mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, TTL, DT, SEE FROM NOTICE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_NO, TTL, NOTICE_CNTN, DT, IMG, USER_ID) VALUES('NO'|| NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ttl}, #{noticeCntn}, #{dt}, #{img}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TTL = #{ttl}, NOTICE_CNTN = #{noticeCntn}, DT = #{dt}, IMG = #{img} WHERE NOTICE_NO=#{noticeNo}
